name: persistentvolumeclaimstatus-v1
description: StorageClass describes the parameters for a class of storage for which PersistentVolumes can be dynamically provisioned.

accessModes.description: AccessModes contains the actual access modes the volume backing the PVC has. More info: http://kubernetes.io/docs/user-guide/persistent-volumes#access-modes-1

capacity.description: Represents the actual resources of the underlying volume.

phase.description: Phase represents the current phase of PersistentVolumeClaim.
